chrome.notes: Is only available to policy installed extensions and dev builds (e.g., Canary).

edge.notes: Is only available to policy installed extensions and dev builds (e.g., Canary).

firefox.notes: User interaction is not required to call this API when the extensions.openPopupWithoutUserGesture.enabled preference is set (bug 1799344).

firefox_android.notes: User interaction is not required to call this API when the extensions.openPopupWithoutUserGesture.enabled preference is set (bug 1799344).

opera.notes: Is only available to policy installed extensions and dev builds (e.g., Canary).

__compat.description: The color property of the details parameter can be set to null.
The color property of the details parameter can be set to a string.
The text property of the details parameter can be set to null.
The path and imageData properties of the details parameter can be set to null.
The popup property of the details parameter can be set to null.
The title property of the details parameter can be set to null.
